name: Extreme Soccer
description:
About This GameEnjoy a 3 VS 3 street football game with players all around the world!
'Extreme Soccer' is a competitive online multiplayer football(futsal) game that offers the excitement of a 3 VS 3 match.Key Features:Each game is fresh and exhilarating due to the real-time physics-based core play.
In each match, you will face new and constantly shifting challenges as your opponents employ innumerable possible strategies against you and your friends.
Unique Characters:
Each of the 5 characters is paired with unique abilities and stats.
A great variety of characters are available for your personal playstyle.
More characters will be updated in the full release version.
Team-Play Enhancement:
Coordinate advanced teamplay maneuvers with an assisted passing system that allows players to pass the ball to teammates across the field with the press of a single button.
Attractive outfits and gears:
Each character has a variety of outfits and gears to be styled up.
